input.sentences: tonight was a family get together . first on the agenda was a game of charades .
after a few heated games of charades | it was time to sit down to dinner .
everyone enjoyed a drink ( or two ) after dinner ! there were some good conversations .
candles were lit to set a relaxed mood in the house .
a red wine was one of the favorite drinks of the night .
output.sentences: Julie enjoyed time with her family from out of town.
They ate some food from a local carry out resturant.
Of course there were drinks involved.
The wine was cheap but delicious.
